web.name: Full Stack Website
web.description: Develop robust full-stack applications using the MERN stack, including user authentication, database integration, advanced functionalities, and host deployment.

web.name: Front-End
web.description: Create responsive and visually appealing websites tailored to your business needs, including landing pages, portfolios, and e-commerce sites.

graphic.name: Logo Design
graphic.description: Create unique, professional logos that reflect your brand identity.

graphic.name: Poster and Event Design
graphic.description: Create eye-catching posters, banners, and event materials for promotions or special occasions.

graphic.name: Social Media Content Creation
graphic.description: Design engaging posts, stories, and advertisements tailored for platforms like Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

graphic.name: Custom Banners
graphic.description: Design high-quality banners for events, advertising, or branding purposes in various sizes (digital or printable).

graphic.name: Business Cards and Flyers
graphic.description: Design sleek and modern business cards, brochures, and promotional flyers.

graphic.name: T-Shirt Design
graphic.description: Create custom T-shirt designs for teams, events, or branding, tailored to your specifications. Includes digital mock-ups ready for printing.

graphic.name: Presentation Design
graphic.description: Craft visually stunning and professional PowerPoint or Canva presentations for pitches, conferences, and seminars.
